pullrequest.title: Added ability to restore UI state

content.raw: No, if labconfig does not specify that a file should be auto-loaded, then no file should be auto-loaded. So I think it should be left as is. The default labconfig will specify that a particular config file should be autoloaded, but if the user deletes it then lyse should just start up blank.
content.html: No, if labconfig does not specify that a file should be auto-loaded, then no file should be auto-loaded. So I think it should be left as is. The default labconfig will specify that a particular config file should be autoloaded, but if the user deletes it then lyse should just start up blank.
